actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide estate tax relief for victims of the terrorist-caused airplane crash near Lockerbie, Scotland, in 1988.

summary.text: Prohibits the imposition of the estate tax on the transfer of the taxable estate of a citizen or resident of the United States who died as a direct result of the Pan American Airways Flight 103 terrorist disaster over Lockerbie, Scotland, on December 21, 1988.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide estate tax relief for victims of the terrorist-caused airplane crash near Lockerbie, Scotland, in 1988.
